Player History
Drafted in 18th round, 207th overall pick, by Houston in 2019...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/1/2019, off Robert Scherer (WAS)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/6/2019, off Ricky Steppe (BAL)...
Hit for the cycle against New York on 8/12/2019...
Had 5 hits with 6 RBI against New York on 8/12/2019...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/14/2019, hitting .500 with 1 HR, 7 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Washington on 5/28/2020...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/19/2020, hitting .500 with 3 HR, 5 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 8/1/2020, hitting .319 with 9 HR, 19 RBI...
Won Conference Championship with Houston in 2020...
Signed as a free agent by Pittsburgh on 2/21/2021 to a 1-year deal worth $7,700,000 per year...
